title: DC Collectibles Batman: Black and White: Batman by Carlos D'Anda Statue
features: Statue Designed By Carlos D'Anda, concept artist of the Batman: Arkham Asylum video game
description: Designed by Carlos D'Anda. Sculpted by Erick Sosa. From the designs of Carlos D'Anda-the concept artist of the Batman: Arkham Asylum video game -comes the latest installments in the popular Batman: Black and White line. Limited Edition of 5,200 Measures Approximately 8" Tall.
